https://tmrev.io/movie/566555-Detective Conan: The Fist of Blue Sapphire 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2fMaUKFOaNOVJEBl0hz0jo4e7HW.jpg The world's greatest blue sapphire, the "blue lapis fist", said to have sunk in a pirate ship in the late 19th century, on the coasts of Singapore. A local millionaire plots to retrieve it, and when it's exhibited in an exhibition at the Singaporean Marina Sands hotel, a murder takes place. Detective Conan: The Fist of Blue Sapphire
